pos_mean_info_list.mean: 巨大地，庞大地；非常地，在极大程度上

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指某物很大，大得惊人；也可用作引申意义。
侧重尺寸、规模和体积的无比巨大。
含义广，强调体积或容积的庞大。也可用于引申意义。
指面积或体积的巨大，但多用于引申意义。
指大的体积、数量和重量，侧重庞大而笨重。
多指空间、面积、范围的巨大，不涉及重量。
指体积、数量或程度远远超过一般标准。
正式用词，侧重空间的广阔，也指面积或分量的巨大。
非正式用词，多为褒义。指如巨人般的庞大体积。

bilingual.source: And as he walked, Agatha saw that his enormous feet.
bilingual.target: 当他走路时，阿加莎看到他巨大的脚。

bilingual.source: It was formed when an enormous volcano erupted over 2 million years ago.
bilingual.target: 它是在两百多万年前一座巨大的火山喷发时形成的。

bilingual.source: The company made an enormous profit last year.
bilingual.target: 这家公司去年赚取了巨大的利润。

bilingual.source: The potentiality of this new technology is enormous.
bilingual.target: 这项新技术的潜力是巨大的。

bilingual.source: The economic impact of the natural disaster is enormous.
bilingual.target: 这场自然灾害的经济影响是巨大的。

bilingual.source: The potential of nanotechnology in electronics is enormous.
bilingual.target: 纳米技术在电子领域的潜力是巨大的。

bilingual.source: The impact of the discovery was enormous on the scientific community.
bilingual.target: 这一发现对科学界产生了巨大的影响。

bilingual.source: The children were fascinated by the enormous porker at the petting zoo.
bilingual.target: 孩子们对宠物园里那头巨大的肥猪感到着迷。

bilingual.source: There's no question that self-driving vehicles could be an enormous benefit.
bilingual.target: 毫无疑问，自动驾驶汽车可以带来巨大的好处。

list.abstract: enormous（英[ɪˈnɔːməs]，美[ɪˈnɔːrməs]），英语单词，作形容词用，为极大的；巨大的；庞大的。短语搭配有enormous potential（极大的潜力），例句为“Those that provide enormous government subsidies.（那些提供巨额政府补贴的机构）”。 enormous形容词类近义词有huge、tremendous、massive等。

yingyinNormal.en: Space exploration demands enormous resources. The kind that government agencies like NASA can marshal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太空探索需要巨大的资源，像美国宇航局这样的政府机构可以引领。

yingyinNormal.en: The surface of the Earth was like an enormous bubble, heated under pressure to over 700 degrees Celsius.
yingyinNormal.zh: 地球表面就像一个巨大的泡泡，在高压下升温直至达到700多摄氏度。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. Yes. Now Pedra planted the bean and it grew into an enormous bean stalk that went high into the sky. That's right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢！没错。接着，佩德罗种下魔豆，魔豆发芽长大变成了巨大的豆茎，豆茎高耸入云。说的没错！

yingyinNormal.en: I read recently about a fellow in Kansas with an enormous ball of twine. I bet you could give him a run for his money.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我最近得知堪萨斯州一个家伙拿麻绳团了一个巨大的球，我认为你可以跟他一比高下。

yingyinNormal.en: Take a walk through a watery world, filled with over thirty thousand creatures from the deep, including enormous rays and sharks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在水中世界漫步参观，里面展出的动物超过 3 万只，包括巨大的魟鱼和鲨鱼。

yingyinNormal.en: Supreme Leader Kim, when the United States, which has an enormous stockpile of nuclear weapons, insists that countries like yours have none, does that feel hypocritical to you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 最高领袖，金，当美国拥有巨大的核武库存时，而像你的国家却没有，这是否让你觉得虚伪。

yingyinNormal.en: Our walls, our enormous towns, can be seen from the sky.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在天空就能看到数不胜数的城墙和城市。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. But pizza, Now, pizza I have enormous respect for. And of cause beer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道，但比萨饼，我对比萨饼是无限的尊敬，还有啤酒。

yingyinNormal.en: But we, humanity, have made an enormous leap forward in the last 20 years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我们人类在这20年里已经迈出了一大步。

yingyinNormal.en: Each of you has been blessed with this enormous opportunity of attending this prestigious school.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每位来这所知名学府学习的同学都被赐予了极大的机遇。

yingyinNormal.en: The problem is too enormous, there has to be some way that this darkness can be banished with light.
yingyinNormal.zh: 问题依然非常显著，一定有某种方法能够使光明驱走黑暗。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, I know I'm proposing an enormous undertaking, so why don't you take a few moments to discuss it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道这个提议比较重大，你们花几分钟讨论一下吧？

yingyinNormal.en: It was an enormous risk. Steel was traditionally made from iron ore, and scrap was a fringe ingredient.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个很大的冒险，钢是从铁矿石炼来的，而这些碎片只是边缘成份。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry? I believe one day Sheldon will eat an enormous amount of Thai food and split into two Sheldons.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么意思？我相信总有一天谢尔顿吃了足够多的泰国菜然后分裂成两个。

yingyinNormal.en: The region stricken by this power outage is enormous. Here in New York city, the only thing to do was walk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 受此事件影响的范围很大,纽约市里的人只得步行。

yingyinNormal.en: One powerful, mythical creature that holds enormous significance in Hong Kong and indeed all of China is the Dragon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有一种特别有威力，神秘的动物，对香港，乃至全中国都有特别重大的意义，那就是龙。

yingyinNormal.en: That's six times more than any other country. But historically, this enormous industry has been plagued by inefficiency.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是其他国家的六倍，但是历史上这一大工业曾被低效率困扰着。

yingyinNormal.en: What am I gonna do? I don't know. You can't take it down. You'll break her heart. Look at that face. That enormous, unsettling, crazy face.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我该怎么办？我不知道，你不可以拿下来，艾米会伤心的。看看那张脸，那张让人心烦又抓狂的大脸。

yingyinNormal.en: It already takes enormous particle accelerators like the Large Hadron Collider to accelerate tiny subatomic particles to close to light speed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 庞大量的粒子加速器如大型粒子对撞机已被需要来把微小的亚原子粒子加速到达接近光速了。

yingyinNormal.en: And the channels you're least investing in are adding enormous value in segments that currently appear to have low value but actually have the highest spending potential.
yingyinNormal.zh: 吸引投资最少，投入了巨大财力的环节，现在看来创造的价值却是最少的，但实际上有很高的消费潜力。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 巨大地；庞大地；非常地

word_family.mean: adj. 极大的；巨大的；庞大的

sense_info_list.en: very large in size, quantity, or extent

examination_example.sentence: Yet this <highlight>enormous</highlight> resource is not contributing enough to today's global challenges, including climate change, security, sustainable development and health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这一巨大资源不足以应对当今包括气候变化、安全、可持续发展和健康的全球挑战。

examination_example.sentence: There's no doubt that our peer groups exert <highlight>enormous</highlight> influence on our behavior.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毫无疑问，我们的同伴群体对我们的行为产生了巨大的影响。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重尺寸、规模和体积或总量极大。
非正式用词, 多为褒义。指如巨人般的庞大体积。只作定语, 指比其他同类事物大。
指面积或体积的巨大, 但多用于引申意义。指规格、数量或程度巨大的, 含超出常规或预想之意。
含义广, 强调体积或容积的庞大, 但通常不用于重量, 也可用于引申意义。
正式用词, 侧重空间的广阔, 也指面积或分量的巨大。指体积、数量或程度等超过一搬标准的。
指大的体积、数量和重量, 侧重庞大而笨重。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: very large in size or quantity

examination_example.sentence: It is reported that depression results in <highlight>enormous</highlight> economic losses worldwide.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据报道，经济萧条在世界范围内造成了巨大的经济损失。

examination_example.sentence: Professor Shook Godel of Georgia Tech developed an sacrificially intelligent teaching assistant to help handle <highlight>enormous</highlight> number of student questions in the online class, Knowledge Based Artificial Intelligence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 佐治亚理工学院的肖克·戈德尔教授开发了一种人工智能教学助手，来帮助处理“基于人工智能的知识”这门网课中大量的学生提问。

examination_example.sentence: There's no question that self-driving vehicles could be an <highlight>enormous</highlight> benefit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毫无疑问，自动驾驶汽车可以带来巨大的好处。
